title: Police investigate homicide: Man suffering from gunshot wound dies at the hospital
content:
MILWAUKEE — Milwaukee police are investigating a homicide that happened on Saturday evening, February 13th.
Police say at around 7:30 p.m., a 44-year-old Milwaukee man, who has been identified as Robert Brown, walked into a hospital, suffering from a gunshot wound.
Despite life-saving efforts by hospital staff, Brown died as a result of his injuries.
Police have been able to determine this shooting happened near 30th and Wisconsin Avenue around 7:15 p.m.
MPD is seeking a known suspect in this case.
